DOC.brief_summary: In this study, the investigators utilized the 18F-fluoride PET method to evaluate THA cases with a stable, septic or septic loosened implant in order to differentiate these clinical settings using a novel uptake type classification approach.
DOC.brief_title: Differentiation of Aseptic From Septic Loosening by 18F-fluoride PET
DOC.keyword: To clarify the 18F-fluoride uptake patterns associated with aseptic or septic loosening
